column1: Huadian (simplified Chinese: 桦甸; traditional Chinese: 樺甸; pinyin: Huàdiàn) is a city in south-central Jilin province
column2: People's Republic of China. It is under the administration of the prefecture-level city of Jilin City.

column3: humid continental climate (Köppen Dwa). Winters are long (lasting from November to March)
column7: due to the influence of the Siberian anticyclone
column8: with a January mean temperature of −17.9 °C (−0.2 °F). Spring and autumn are somewhat short transitional periods
column10: but are usually dry and windy. Summers are hot and humid
column11: with a prevailing southeasterly wind due to the East Asian monsoon; July averages 22.5 °C (72.5 °F). Snow is usually light during the winter
column12: and annual rainfall is heavily concentrated from June to August.
